title: MongoDB $weeklyUpdate #94 (November 4, 2022): Azure Functions, Datadog, & Aggregation Pipelines
description: It's Friday. You know what that means…           🎉 Welcome to the MongoDB $weeklyUpdate! 🎉   Each...
body_html:
It's Friday. You know what that means…

🎉 Welcome to the MongoDB $weeklyUpdate! 🎉

Each week, we bring you the latest and greatest from our Developer Relations team — from blog posts and YouTube videos to meet-ups and conferences — so you don’t miss a thing.

💻 What’s Up on Developer Center?

Everything you see on Developer Center is by developers, for developers. This is where we publish articles, tutorials, quickstarts, and beyond. 🚀

Featured Post

Getting Started with MongoDB Atlas and Azure Functions Using Node.js

In this tutorial, @nraboy shows us just how easy it is to interact with MongoDB Atlas using Azure functions.

Other Shout-Outs

➡️ Implement Update and Delete Operations in React Using the Atlas GraphQL API by @sourabhbagrecha

➡️ Integrate Atlas Application Services Logs into Datadog on AWS by @bvasan and Abilash Ravikumar

🔦 MVP Spotlight: Jesse Hall

Each week, we feature a member of our team or a brilliant partner we’re collaborating with. This week, get to know Jesse!

Jesse is a Senior Developer Advocate and our YouTube expert.

Fun fact: "I love to be outdoors camping, hiking, fishing, etc when I have time, which is not as often as I'd like."

Pet peeve: "Turn the light switch off when you leave the room! 😅 "

Be sure to check out Jesse on YouTube.

🗓️ Mark Your Calendars

Every month, all across the globe, we organize, attend, speak at, and sponsor events, meetups, and shindigs to bring the DevRel community together. Here’s what we’ve got cooking:

MongoDB @ Web Summit: November 01 - 04, 2022
Thailand MUG: November 4th 2022, 11:00pm, (GMT-07:00) Pacific Time, Bangkok, Thailand
MongoDB Day Melbourne: November 15, 2022, 8:00am - 4:30pm AEST, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
MongoDB .local London: November 15, 2022, 8:00am - 5:00pm GMT, London, UK
MongoDB Beijing: November 16 - 17, 2022, Beijing, China
MongoDB Day Auckland: November 17, 2022, 8:00am - 4:30am NZDT, Auckland, New Zealand
MongoDB Day Singapore: November 23, 2022, 9:00am - 5:00pm SGT, Singapore
MongoDB at AWS re:Invent: November 29 - December 02, 2022, Las Vegas, Nevada, United States
MongoDB Day Taipei: November 30 - December 01, 2022, Taipei, Taiwan

🎙️ Stop, Collaborate, and Listen

If reading’s not your jam, you might love catching up on our podcast episodes.

Latest Episode

Not listening on Spotify? We got you! We’re also on Apple Podcasts, PlayerFM, Podtail, and Listen Notes. (We’d be forever grateful if you left us a review.)

Catch the latest on YouTube with @nraboy.

Be sure you subscribe to YouTube so you never miss a video.

That’ll do it for now, folks! Like what you see? Help us spread the love by tweeting this update or sharing it on LinkedIn and Twitter.
body_markdown:
It's Friday. You know what that means…

## 🎉 Welcome to the MongoDB $weeklyUpdate! 🎉

Each week, we bring you the latest and greatest from our Developer Relations team — from blog posts and YouTube videos to meet-ups and conferences — so you don’t miss a thing.

## 💻 What’s Up on Developer Center?

Everything you see on [Developer Center](https://www.mongodb.com/developer/) is by developers, for developers. This is where we publish articles, tutorials, quickstarts, and beyond. 🚀

### Featured Post

[Getting Started with MongoDB Atlas and Azure Functions Using Node.js](https://www.mongodb.com/developer/products/atlas/getting-started-mongodb-atlas-azure-functions-nodejs/)

![Getting Started with MongoDB Atlas and Azure Functions Using Node.js](https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/r47mlsrekiuvxx7qu16m.png)

In this tutorial, @nraboy shows us just how easy it is to interact with MongoDB Atlas using Azure functions.

### Other Shout-Outs

#### ➡️ [Implement Update and Delete Operations in React Using the Atlas GraphQL API](https://www.mongodb.com/developer/products/atlas/update-delete-operations-using-atlas-graphql-api/) by @sourabhbagrecha  

#### ➡️ [Integrate Atlas Application Services Logs into Datadog on AWS](https://www.mongodb.com/developer/products/atlas/integrate-atlas-application-services-logs-datadog-aws/) by @bvasan and Abilash Ravikumar

## 🔦 MVP Spotlight: Jesse Hall

Each week, we feature a member of our team or a brilliant partner we’re collaborating with. This week, get to know Jesse!

![Jesse's pets](https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/3cyaki8cytw0y91hgkc0.jpg)

Jesse is a Senior Developer Advocate and our YouTube expert.

Fun fact: "I love to be outdoors camping, hiking, fishing, etc when I have time, which is not as often as I'd like."

Pet peeve: "Turn the light switch off when you leave the room! :sweat_smile: "

Be sure to [check out Jesse on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/codeSTACKr).

## 🗓️ Mark Your Calendars

Every month, all across the globe, we organize, attend, speak at, and sponsor events, meetups, and shindigs to bring the DevRel community together. Here’s what we’ve got cooking:

[MongoDB @ Web Summit](https://www.mongodb.com/events/mdb-websummit): November 01 - 04, 2022
[Thailand MUG](https://www.mongodb.com/community/forums/t/thailand-mug-inaugural-in-person-meetup/192568): November 4th 2022, 11:00pm, (GMT-07:00) Pacific Time, Bangkok, Thailand
[MongoDB Day Melbourne](https://www.mongodb.com/events/mongodb-days-apac-2022/melbourne): November 15, 2022, 8:00am - 4:30pm AEST, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
[MongoDB .local London](https://www.mongodb.com/events/london): November 15, 2022, 8:00am - 5:00pm GMT, London, UK
[MongoDB Beijing](https://www.mongodb.com/events/mongodb-days-apac-2022/beijing): November 16 - 17, 2022, Beijing, China
[MongoDB Day Auckland](https://www.mongodb.com/events/mongodb-days-apac-2022/auckland): November 17, 2022, 8:00am - 4:30am NZDT, Auckland, New Zealand
[MongoDB Day Singapore](https://www.mongodb.com/events/mongodb-days-apac-2022/singapore): November 23, 2022, 9:00am - 5:00pm SGT, Singapore
[MongoDB at AWS re:Invent](https://www.mongodb.com/events/aws-reinvent): November 29 - December 02, 2022, Las Vegas, Nevada, United States
[MongoDB Day Taipei](https://www.mongodb.com/events/mongodb-days-apac-2022/taipei): November 30 - December 01, 2022, Taipei, Taiwan

## 🎙️ Stop, Collaborate, and Listen

If reading’s not your jam, you might love catching up on our [podcast episodes](https://open.spotify.com/show/0ibUtrJG4JVgwfvB2MXMSb).

*Latest Episode*
{% spotify spotify:episode:1bQgOUeayRkwJAVSeqjzeM%}

Not listening on Spotify? We got you! We’re also on [Apple Podcasts](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-mongodb-podcast/id1500452446), [PlayerFM](https://player.fm/series/the-mongodb-podcast), [Podtail](https://podtail.com/en/podcast/the-mongodb-podcast/), and [Listen Notes](https://www.listennotes.com/podcasts/the-mongodb-podcast-mongodb-0g6fUKMDN_y/). (We’d be forever grateful if you left us a review.)

Catch the latest on YouTube with @nraboy. 

{% youtube 7F0a1_ZLepI %}

Be sure you [subscribe to YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/MongoDBofficial?sub_confirmation=1) so you never miss a video.

That’ll do it for now, folks! Like what you see? Help us spread the love by tweeting this update or sharing it on LinkedIn and Twitter.
